Map File Contains Unexisting Project

Since:
Last Modified: $Date: 2004/04/19 15:52:45 $

Test Steps:

  1. Select a map file
  2. Add an entry line which refers to an unexisting project
  3. Save the map file
  4. Right click the map file having the entry
  5. Click Team->Load Map Projects

Expected Results:

  1. Error occured for the unexisting project and the project is ignored
  2. Only valid project is loaded
